trans-unit.source: Provides access to the HTTP request to access and respond to the additional information made available for requests over the HTTP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 HTTP 请求的访问，以访问和响应通过 HTTP 协议提供给请求的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This is a general-purpose class that gives the developer direct access to the HTTP request information, which can be used for encapsulating HTTP-specific information.
trans-unit.target: 这是允许开发人员直接访问 HTTP 请求信息的常规用途类，该类可用于包装特定于 HTTP 的信息。

trans-unit.source: One example of the use of this class is to support services implemented in accordance with the Representational State Transfer (REST) architecture.
trans-unit.target: 此类的一个示例用途是支持根据“具象状态传输”(REST) 体系结构实现的服务。

trans-unit.source: This class enables support for the following scenarios:
trans-unit.target: 此类可实现对下列方案的支持：

trans-unit.source: Varies the HTTP verb used for each request.
trans-unit.target: 改变用于每个请求的 HTTP 谓词。

trans-unit.source: Allows HTTP header (key, value) pairs to be set and queried by request.
trans-unit.target: 允许请求设置和查询 HTTP 标头 (key, value) 对。

trans-unit.source: Allows the query string to be specified for an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 允许为 HTTP 请求指定查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> and related classes.
trans-unit.target: 此类可由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement> 和相关类使用。

trans-unit.source: For incoming messages, this property is added to messages.
trans-unit.target: 对于传入消息，此属性将添加到消息中。

trans-unit.source: For outgoing messages, this property causes the following to happen:
trans-unit.target: 对于传出消息，此属性将造成以下情况发生：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.Method%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.Method%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.Method%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.QueryString%2A> is appended to the <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.QueryString%2A> 被追加到 <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.RequestUri%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.Headers%2A> is added to the HTTP headers set to be transmitted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.Headers%2A> 被添加到设置为要传送的 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to set several of the properties in an instance of this class and incorporate the instance into a message.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何在此类的实例中设置若干属性，并将该实例合并到消息中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the object as follows:
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化对象的方式如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.Method%2A> = `POST`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.Method%2A> = `POST`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.QueryString%2A> is set to the empty string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.QueryString%2A> 设置为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.SuppressEntityBody%2A> = `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.SuppressEntityBody%2A> = `false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to instantiate this class from a message without explicitly calling the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何不通过显式调用构造函数来从消息实例化此类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTTP headers from the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 从 HTTP 请求获取 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" /> that contains the HTTP headers in the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection" />，其中包含 HTTP 请求中的 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: There are situations in which this property is not available and attempts to access it may cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 有时此属性不可用，并且尝试访问此属性可能会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This can happen when [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] is hosted in IIS, after the HTTP request is complete, especially in one-way scenarios where the reply is sent back before the message has become available.
trans-unit.target: 在 IIS 中承载 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 以及在完成 HTTP 请求之后都可能出现上述问题，而对于在消息可用前发回答复的单向方案而言，该问题尤为突出。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use this property to add custom headers to a message.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用此属性将自定义标头添加到消息中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the HTTP verb for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求的 HTTP 谓词。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP verb for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 请求的 HTTP 谓词。

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] uses the POST verb for HTTP messages.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 对 HTTP 消息使用 POST 谓词。

trans-unit.source: The GET verb is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to display help information when accessing a ServiceHost's base address.
trans-unit.target: 在访问 ServiceHost 的基址时，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 使用 GET 谓词来显示帮助信息。

trans-unit.source: This is useful for checking whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service is active when using a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 这对于在使用 Web 浏览器时检查 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务是否处于活动状态非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Other methods defined by the [HTTP RFC](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96616) are PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS, TRACE, and CONNECT.
trans-unit.target: 由定义其他方法[HTTP RFC](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96616) PUT、 DELETE、 HEAD、 选项、 跟踪和连接。

trans-unit.source: These methods have special behaviors when interoperating with other services.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法在与其他服务进行互操作时有特殊的行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code gets an instance of this class from the message and then dispatches to different methods based on this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码从消息中获取此类的实例，然后根据此属性调度到不同的方法。

trans-unit.source: The value is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 值设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the message property associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty" /> 类关联的消息属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value "httpRequest".
trans-unit.target: 值“httpRequest”。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query string for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 HTTP 请求的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: The query string from the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 请求中的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: There are many well-known security attacks based on an HTTP request's query string (for example, the SQL injection attack).
trans-unit.target: 有很多基于 HTTP 请求查询字符串的已知安全攻击（例如，SQL 注入攻击）。

trans-unit.source: Always rigorously validate the parameters contained in the query string.
trans-unit.target: 请总是严格验证包含在查询字符串中的参数。

trans-unit.source: If you use the values without validation, a well-known security hole is open.
trans-unit.target: 如果不经验证就使用值，那等于开放众所周知的安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The value is set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 值设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the body of the message is ignored and only the headers are sent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否忽略消息正文并且只发送标头。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message body is suppressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁止发送消息正文，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used for empty message requests: for example, a service that accepts a GET request without a message body.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于空消息请求：例如，接受无消息正文的 GET 请求的服务。

trans-unit.source: In this case, when building the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty> object for the response message, set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.SuppressEntityBody%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，生成响应消息的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty> 对象时，请将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpRequestMessageProperty.SuppressEntityBody%2A> 属性设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: When interoperating with non-[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services, it is important to note that certain verbs are expected to contain a message body according to the HTTP standard; these include PUT and POST.
trans-unit.target: 在与非 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务进行互操作时，有重要的一点需要注意，那就是根据 HTTP 标准，某些谓词应包含消息正文；这些谓词包括 PUT 和 POST。

trans-unit.source: Other verbs are expected to suppress the message body; these include GET and HEAD.
trans-unit.target: 而有些谓词应不含消息正文；这些谓词包括 GET 和 HEAD。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前对象的一个副本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty" /> object that represents a copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty" /> 对象，该对象表示当前对象的副本。
